name: Who am I?
intro: Passionate about web development and new technologies, I create modern and high-performance digital solutions.
paragraphs: Hello, my name is Florian Giurgiu, a final-year engineering student at Télécom Saint-Étienne and currently on an Erasmus exchange at the University of Padua in Italy. Passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, and Software Development, I enjoy designing and experimenting with innovative solutions that combine mathematics, programming, and creativity.

Curious and persevering, I am equally interested in deep learning (Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Optimization) and full-stack development to bring concrete projects to life. I have had the opportunity to work on various projects: image detection and matching using Deep Learning, developing interactive applications in Java and Qt, as well as creating modern websites with React and Tailwind CSS.

Beyond my studies, I am passionate about bodybuilding and handball, and I have been playing guitar for several years. I also enjoy getting involved in associative life, particularly through organizing E-Sport and cultural events. I speak French and Romanian fluently, and I also have a good level of English (B2), as well as notions in Spanish (A2) and German (A1).
My goal is to put my skills to use in ambitious and innovative projects, where I can learn, share, and have a positive impact.
